title: Cant get launcher to start up
body: When i open up league I get the standard league logo, however Im stuck on it. Nothing else loads. After a while a pop up opens saying, "Another instance of the program is running. Do you want to terminate it?" If I click ok, the logo dissappears and nothing happens, nothing opens up (I've waited 20+ minutes). If i just x out of the pop up, the same things happen or  i get a new pop up after a few minutes saying that PVP.net have stopped working and I have to close the program. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling. My LOL was working earlier today, so it's likely not any patch (however, I was experiencing heavy lag in the games I played today). Any advice is appreciated. HEEEELLPPP!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Both situations you're describing lead me to believe that you're experiencing drops in your connection before it hits the server. This could be caused by problems along your route to the server or local network settings. As a first step, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Let me know if you have any issues after completing those steps.

In total irony, I was on that thread going through the guide to improve my LOL performance before this issue had arrived. I worked through all the steps again with no success. I am in the process of submitting a ticket to get this issue resolved
